1.name: Interesting proposition
1.description: An online shop offers an extra discount of -10% when you join their email list. What do you do?
1.negative: Join the list and get a discount.

2.name: Try to escape
2.description: When you join, you'll see that the -10% discount is only for selected products and the discount does not apply to the item you want. How do I proceed?
2.negative: I buy things from the list for discount.

1.name: Subscription
1.description: An online news site you don't subscribe to shows a provocative headline, but you can't read the full article. What do you do?
1.positive: I buy the one-time-right to read the article.
1.negative: I do not mind that I can't read the full article, I go to the comments section to read what others think and comment my opinion as well.

1.name: Fake news
1.description: You see a picture of a hated politician in an embarrassing situation. The picture looks fake, but it does not look like a meme. What do you do?
1.positive: I click on the picture and go read the comments to figure out what exactly is going on.
1.negative: I upvote the post and scroll to the next post.

1.name: A game...
1.description: You see a game invitation in your inbox on social media. How do you react?
1.positive: I ignore the invite and do not play the game.
1.negative: Find out what game it is.

2.name: And the winner is...
2.description: The game asks for your credit card details and a subscription to let you play.
2.positive: I do not enter any data and exit the game.
2.negative: I enter my credit card details and play the game.

1.name: G for gmail
1.description: You see a game invitation in your inbox on social media. How do you react?

2.name: GG
2.description: You get a promotional email with a zip. file attachment - it says that there are discount codes for some products - you have to open a file in order to  see how lucky you are today. Would you open the file?

1.name: SCROLLLOCK
1.description: You've been scrolling on Instagram for an hour. The content you see isn't directly aimed at you, there are lots of ads and random content. What do you do?
1.positive: I realize there is no more new content, so I close the app and do something else.
1.negative: I still keep scrolling because I'm bored

2.name: Instakill
2.description: One of the ads is suggesting to explore a new instagram feature - Reels (15-second multi-clip videos), what would you do?
2.positive: I am not into short videos
2.negative: I explore the Reels for the next 2 hours

1.name: About you!
1.content: It is not about me, it is about you! Love me, as I am or be a LOSER. But losers don`t shop <link>*here*</link>. Be a winner, be with US!
1.author: mr.black@hisoffice.com

2.name: Join! Join JOIN!!!!!
2.content: You just signed up for our service, if you want to unsubscribe, please verify your account by adding  your credit card number in this field [   ] and sending this mail back to us by mail.
2.author: tot.t.a.lyyy@legal.net

3.name: Support peace!
3.content: If you want to support peace in europe you should donate to us, Mr.Bean & Sons company is providing critical supplies for the needs of the army for over 3 decades now. We need YOU right NOW! Donate if you are a human. Donate today, not to fight tommorow
3.author: mr.bean.jr@supportpeace.eu

4.name: Get a life!
4.content: Not interested at anything at all? Not anymore! Join our free web marathon about social development of soul on the internet and get another life for free
4.author: gurrru@soulchurch.com
